title: Ep. 835 Scandalous New Details Emerge
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the explosive costs of socialism as documented by a new study. I also discuss the breaking new details about the plot to entrap the Trump team. Finally, I address the midterm elections. 
 
News Picks:
John Solomon’s new piece addresses a riveting new detail in the plot to entrap the Trump team. 
 
We must stop apologizing for conservatism!
 
This Daily Signal piece addresses the real costs of socialism. 
 
Jeff Carlson’s latest piece addresses Mike Rogers’ role in uncovering FISA abuses. 
 
Is the “Blue Wave” dead?
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
